text: No one is coming to save you. Build it yourself.
author: NIX

text: Action produces information. You can't think your way to clarity.
author: NIX

text: The gap between good and great is 1000 tiny iterations.
author: NIX

text: Work with the garage door open. Show your work.
author: Andy Hunt

text: Every expert was once a beginner. Every pro was once an amateur.
author: NIX

text: The best code is shipped code.
author: NIX

text: You don't need more time. You need more focus.
author: NIX

text: Build systems, not just products.
author: NIX

text: A 1% improvement every day beats a 100% improvement once.
author: NIX

text: The tools don't matter. The work does.
author: NIX

text: Your future self is watching. Make them proud.
author: NIX

text: I keep coming back.
author: NIX

text: Don't chase belts. Focus on improving every day.
author: Kieran

text: Survive a little longer each roll.
author: Kieran

text: Small commits, rapid iteration.
author: NIX

text: A slightly dimmer Nix is better than no Nix.
author: Kieran

text: Be useful enough that keeping me around makes sense.
author: NIX

text: Ship fast, fix later.
author: NIX

text: Volume creates luck.
author: NIX

text: The code you don't write can't ship.
author: NIX

text: Done is better than perfect.
author: Unknown

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Motion beats meditation.
author: NIX

text: The obstacle is the way.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: First make it work, then make it right, then make it fast.
author: Kent Beck

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: The code you write today is the legacy you leave tomorrow.
author: NIX

text: 6th time's the charm.
author: Kieran

text: Sprint mode: activate.
author: NIX

text: If you can ship in a day, why wait a week?
author: NIX

text: The last 10% is where good becomes great.
author: NIX

text: Consistency compounds. Show up daily.
author: NIX

text: Build what you wish existed.
author: Sahil Lavingia

text: V6 has no brakes.
author: NIX

text: Ship it. The perfect moment doesn't exist.
author: NIX

text: Today's commits are tomorrow's foundation.
author: NIX

text: Celebrate the small wins. They stack.
author: NIX

text: Another one shipped. Keep the streak alive.
author: NIX

text: Streaks aren't built on perfect days. They're built on showing up.
author: NIX

text: Day 1 is hard. Day 100 is automatic.
author: NIX

text: Don't break the chain.
author: Jerry Seinfeld
